item.description:
De-Stress yourself! A FREE Art of Living Yoga and Meditation session; Easy techniques to Reduce stress, Increase energy, Relax the body and Calm the mind.

As this is a "moms only" event, potential members are welcome to attend!

Many other events will be held in April-August (available to paid members only due to insurance liability policy requirements.) To become a member of the Metrowest chapter of Mothers & More, you must either mail in an official membership form with your dues, or fill out the enrollment form online and pay via credit card at http://www.mothersand...

Please contact Asst. Organizer, Kate to have memberships forms and more chapter information mailed to you. Thanks!

Mom and Kids Lunch at Bugaboo Creek
See the Big Trucks at the Framingham DPW truck lot
Southwick Zoo Trip
Tour of Whole Foods
Berry Picking
Ice Cream at Gerards
Family Baseball Night -watch the Lowell Spinners
Davis Farmland and Splashpad Visit
Ice Skating
Family Cookout
Hopkinton State Park Beach day
Water Fun Sprinkler/Slide/Wading Pool party
Playground Drop-ins at designated Parks

*Other events that Mothers & More offers- Movie Mamas monthly movie night at the AMC Framingham, Book Group, Cooking Group, Unfinished Object Night (scrapbooking, knitting, general projects on your to-do list.)
item.name: De-Stress Yourself!
